bond

Class Serializer

  • Object
    • bond.Serializer

  • public class Serializer
extends Object

    Class used to serialize objects into a JSON representation.

    Internally, this uses Gson to serialize objects. This means, by default, all fields of an object are serialized. The exact settings that are used are as follows:

    
   GsonBuilder().setPrettyPrinting().serializeNulls()
     .serializeSpecialFloatingPointValues().disableHtmlEscaping().create()

    In addition to the settings above, this class includes custom logic to serialize Maps and Sets in a way that their values are sorted by taking the toString of values (for sets) or keys (for maps) to ensure that they will be serialized deterministically. Maps which inherit from SortedMap and Sets which inherit from SortedSet are serialized in their normal sorted order.

    In future releases there will be the option to specify custom serializers for specific types.

      • withToStringSerialization

        public <T> Serializer withToStringSerialization(Class<T> clazz)
        Specify that for objects of type clazz, simply call toString() on the object to serialize it instead of doing a full JSON serialization.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Same as clazz
        Parameters:
        clazz - Type for this to apply to
        Returns:
        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern

      • withDoublePrecision

        public Serializer withDoublePrecision(int places)
        Set the amount of precision to be used when serializing doubles.
        Parameters:
        places - Number of places after the decimal to keep in serialized form
        Returns:
        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern

      • withTypeAdapter

        public Serializer withTypeAdapter(Type type,
                                  Object typeAdapter)
        Set a custom serialization method for type. See GsonBuilder.registerTypeAdapter(Type, Object).
        Parameters:
        type - The type for this adapter to apply to
        typeAdapter - The adapter with custom serialization logic
        Returns:
        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern

      • withTypeHierarchyAdapter

        public Serializer withTypeHierarchyAdapter(Class<?> baseType,
                                           Object typeAdapter)

        Parameters:
        baseType - The baseType for this adapter to apply to
        typeAdapter - The adapter with custom serialization logic
        Returns:
        This object to facilitate a builder-style pattern
